word: "Jesus saith unto her, Mary." That is all He said-- "Mary." Many a time she had heard that familiar voice, and she must have recognized Jesus by His tone or expression, for immediately she acknowledged Him as her Master and Lord. "Touch Me not," He said to her; "for I am not yet ascended to My Father: but go to My brethren, and say unto them, I ascend unto My Father, and your Father; and to My God, and your God." John 20:11-17. Then it was that Mary hastened to the disciples with the glad tidings of a risen Saviour.
